On 15 Jul 2009, at 00:34, "Frank" <afranka69@...> wrote:



I'm new to JUnit. From what I have been able to find out so far it appears that JUnit can not report any kind of test coverage statistics against the source (for example statement or branch coverage). Is that true? If it is, do you know of a tool that does this for Java? There is such a tool for C++.

Frank Ackerman
Montana Tech
